description:
Description :
        "I'm sorry, I pretended to be drunk to be alone with you."
 When I took care of my ex-brother, I was suddenly pushed down on the bed and kissed from restraint with a tie!  ?

 -- Chinatsu Tokiwa, who is vulnerable to changes in the environment and loves a peaceful life.  One day, I see a familiar figure among the new employees... What's more, her ex-brother-in-law, Azusa, has joined our company!?
 She used to live with Azusa because her parents remarried, but she was estranged due to her parents' divorce.
 I don't want to bother her, but she doesn't want to talk to me, so I decided to send a drunken Azusa to her welcome party.  As soon as I was about to carry him back to bed safely, Azusa suddenly changed from her old sleeping face to that of a male!  ?

 It's different from those days, with a big hand and strong power, hitting the monopoly desire... The obsessive love that begins with a reunion!
